events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position. Our team is excited to review your qualifications and experience.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your skills and the role you applied for.
A recruiter specializing in technical roles has been assigned to your application and will be in contact shortly for next steps.
The initial screening call went well. We discussed your background in software development and your experience with cloud technologies.
You have responded promptly expressing enthusiasm for the opportunity and your availability for the upcoming interview stages.
The technical interview has been scheduled for May 15th at 3 PM UTC. Please prepare to discuss your coding skills and system design experience.
You completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and solid knowledge of software engineering principles.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for May 18th at 11 AM UTC to discuss company culture, benefits, and your career goals.
The HR interview was positive, with good alignment on your aspirations and the companyâ€™s values and work environment.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer position including competitive salary and benefits reflecting your expertise.
You have provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed eagerness to join our engineering team and contribute to exciting projects.
You officially accepted the job offer. We're thrilled to welcome you on board as part of our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started, including orientation sessions and setup of all necessary development tools and resources.
The hiring process is officially closed. Congratulations on becoming a full member of our engineering department.
